import React , { useState } from 'react' import { Tooltip } from 'reactstrap' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import './Single.scss' const SingleActor = ({name, id, profile_path, known_for_department, popularity}) => { const [tooltipOpen, setTooltipOpen] = useState(false); const toggle = () => setTooltipOpen(!tooltipOpen); return ( <>
{name}
{ (profile_path) ? : null }

{name}

Known for {known_for_department}

Popularity {popularity}

{original_title} {year}

IMDB { vote_average}

{overview}

Watch NOW
) } export default SingleActor
